extendedInfo.description: "ICS Barcode Scanner" is based on famous app "Barcode Scanner", but enhanced with more great features!"ICS Barcode Scanner" is holo style scanner, which allows auto-scanning of multiple barcode formats by your phone camera. (QR Code, Data Matrix, EAN 8/13, Code39, Code128, etc.) By "ICS Barcode Scanner", you can also share your contacts, apps, bookmarks or specialized text via QR Code with your friends.If you like "ICS Barcode Scanner", please tell your friends! Thank you for your support.This app is supported via search. Please note that the following will be added to your device once you download the app â Search icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You can delete/replace these search points easily. This is a way to make money from this app and giving it to you for free. Thank you for your understanding.

reviews.title: Antispy Mobile Says: SUSPICIOUS + Airpush Ads!
reviews.comment: Update 10/18/12: Out of nowhere I started getting ads that vibrated my phone and showed an ad in the drop down. These are called Airpush ads and the culprit was Barcode Scanner! Search for either \"Airpush Finder\" or \"Ad Network Detector\" in the Play Store (both free), download, and they\'ll tell you which apps, such as this one, are pushing ads to you in this OBNOXIOUS way. Then you can delete the app and install one that does not use Airpush ads.  As of 10/10/12 Antispy Mobile Pro now rates this app as \"Suspicious\" because it: 1. Reads my browser bookmarks (that right there is enough for me to remove it), but it ALSO  2. Runs on startup 3. Oddly needs my location data via cell & WiFi. There\'s NO REASON this app needs to do any of that. Good-bye and please COME CLEAN as to why out of nowhere this app needs those permissions!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uses Airpush
reviews.comment: New update started pushing random AirPush ads to my notification bar. Inapp notifications are fine but AirPush is simply unnecessary.

reviews.title: New Permissions
reviews.comment: The new permissions this app requests are NOT necessary and reads like a list of things a virus does. Writes bookmark history? Location? Not okay, explain.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Comes with Airpush ads
reviews.comment: I give this app 1 star only because I can\'t give it a zero star.  I soon as I first used it...it started serving up dating site ads in the notification bar.  That\'s a deal breaker for me but that\'s my opinion.  I immediately uninstalled and ads are gone.  I\'m also not sure how the rating comes up to 3.1.  As far as the listed reviews go, there are only (3) 5 star ratings...not 42, (0) 4 star ratings...not 7, (1) 3 star rating...not 3, (0) 2 star ratings...not 3, and (16) 1 star ratings...not 41.  That\'s a total of 34 stars divided by 20 ratings = 1.7 stars.  Maybe I flunked math.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ads and spam don\'t download
reviews.comment: Don\'t download this app. It is an airpush app (spam notifications sent to your notification bar)
